He rams a Faerie into a pil Shredding the stone, the Faerie explodes in shards and reforms immediately behind Eric. Grabbing the first man in sight, the Faerie throws the po soldier to the other side of the room. on the opposite side another Faerie slides faster than th blink of an eye, grabs the man in flight extending it's cutting limbs and claws the soldier to his death. It is like carnage in slow motion. 209d OMITTED 209d 209e MOVED TO 209B 209e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: William is being overrun by a school of shards. The shard shape up into a Faerie taking William up high. In a viole arm blow, the Faerie projects William onto the banquet ta six feet lower. The table shatters in splinters, William bouncing like a rag doll. Spinning around on it's way down, the Faerie skewers a soldier and impales another one into a pillar. The Faerie drags him ten feet up, tearing and digging deep into the stone column.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enraged, Snow White jolts her body and frees herself from Ravenna's grasp. She swings her sword at Ravenna. She parries every attack with her bare hands. Snow White is breathless. One more strike... but Ravenna blocks it again, and this time she doesn't let go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (face to face with Snow White) You were never ready for this princess! Snow White struggles to get out of her lock. Ravenna is t strong. Snow White's wrist is twisted. She holds her sword tight can't use it. Ravenna forces the twist. Her fragile bones crack.  Snow White screams in pain. The sword drops on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will... defeat... you... I am the  only...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... please! Ravenna back hands Snow White, sending her crashing to th wall. SLAM! Cuts on her face.  Ravenna looms closer, through the fire in the middle of t room. She stands IN the fire, unaffected. For Snow White it is a vision of pure hell. So much power much hate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have lived many lives. Ravaged entire kingdoms, I have been given powers you can't fathom. You cannot defeat ME?  .you are but a child!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ravenna's skin blisters and heals. Ravenna raises her arm and black shards start to cover the walls behind her... entombing them in darkness... the trap closes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you are right... it is over.  Ravenna's laughter pierces Snow White like a dagger.  She feels powerless and lost, spitting blood and exhauste What else can she do? Snow White stands up, stumbles, her right arm limp, blood dripping down her face.  She stares at Ravenna, she won't back down... she will ne back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: William, stumbling upon the dead bodies of his comrades, the shards starting to obstruct the entry of the mirror r He runs towards it. Eric sees him and goes for it too. Behind William and in front of Eric, a Dark creature shap up. William doesn't see it. The Faerie claws William from behind through his armor, stopping him still and sending him backwards against a pi like a stone ricochet. The Faerie spins it's head 180 degrees and goes from turn its back to Eric... to facing the huntsman. Eric stops and tries to pull back. The Faerie powers up gathering shards from another creatu doubling in size and density. Like a fire hose of black shards, the Dark Faerie unloads stream of razor blades at Eric. Eric digs his heels in... slowly grinds and slides on the floor, double shields up. The shields are being shredded. One shield gives way completely torn slicing Eric's arm. Eric has one shield left. He kneels down... it is a matte seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ravenna approaches and grabs Snow White by the throat, squeezing hard. Snow White is chocking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will never stop... I will give this wretched world the Queen it deserves... Ravenna slams Snow White down onto the stone floor next t the mirror altar. Snow White stretches for her sword as Ravenna approaches. Ravenna un-sheaths her dagger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A life .for a life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow White tries to reach her sword with her left hand, b it is too far. She tries to drag herself a little closer. still too far. Ravenna straddles Snow White, raises her dagger above her head - smiling, relishing the imminent death blow. The bl tomb has closed in around them. Eric watches - despair wrought on his face -- as the knif falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a spell incantation) By fairest blood it is done! Ravenna strikes... in the blink of an eye Snow White bloc her strike, reaches for her dagger and plunges it into Ravenna's chest, just as the huntsman taught her. Ravenna gasps, locks eyes with Snow White.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers to Ravenna) By fairest blood... it is undone! Ravenna looks down. Three drops of blood fall onto Snow White's armor.

dialogues.speaker: BOOM... BOOM... BOOM
dialogues.text: Ravenna stares in shock and disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: She pulls out the dagger, her face starts to age.  Ravenna is aging at an incredible pace. Her body gives wa and she slumps to the floor, below the mirror.  She looks at the mirror above her, gasping, reaching out, pale eyes looking for a friend, a miracle... but nothing. The black shards that entombed the room start to shatter fall to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: William is on the ground, out of strength and has given u the fight. A dark creature is slowly close to reaching William's face with his sharp claws as William tries to h the creature's arm with his bare hands, severely bleeding

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Faeries have slowed down dramatically. Eric grabs a s on the ground and slices the Faerie in front of him... th Faerie shatters. William looks at Eric, in desperation begging for help. T two men lock eyes. A silent understanding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric throws his sword and blows the other Dark Faerie in pieces, releasing William. A silent pact has been made at this moment between the tw men. The remaining Dark Creature freezes. Eric and William are barely alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow White approaches Ravenna and kneels beside her, Rave is weak. She ages dozens of years within seconds, her fac shows no anger, no hate, just a strange understanding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why this? Why all of this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow White, overwhelmed by compassion, places her hand on Ravenna's chest. Ravenna puts her own wrinkled hand on Sn White's. Ravenna smiles. She gently taps on Snow White's... in a  strange and affectionate motherly way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric and William, exhausted and battered climb the steps the mirror chamber. It is over.  Ravenna stares up at Snow White's face in a shining halo light above her from the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering to Snow White) See child,... we are bound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers to Ravenna calming) It will be all right... Ravenna whispers incomprehensible words with a peaceful s on her face. The clouds move in the disc of light above S White. The light falls over Ravenna's face.  The light fades out of her eyes and she dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the cloister gardens, a blossom flowers on the apple t the world is born again --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In death, Ravenna's beautiful blue eyes are wide open, fi the halo of light that surrounds Snow White's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Backlit in a golden hue. A crown is placed on her head. We're in... Packed for the coronation. Duke Hammond and Bishops surro her. Snow White smiles and looks out at all assembled - h subjects, her friends, the people she's come to know and - meeting the eyes of Rose, looking young and beautiful a -- Anna and Lily -- the seven dwarves, who all wipe away tears. She sees William off to the side, smiling, looking on adoringly. But her eyes continue through the crowd, looki

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric, in the very back of the cathedral, near the door. Their eyes meet, as if they're the only two in the room. This lasts several moments until --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hail to the Queen! And then the huntsman smiles and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The land was healed, and the rightful Queen brought an age of peace and prosperity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We drop down from the castle to find the huntsman, on hor heading toward us.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: As for the huntsman... Eric goes under the village arch, back toward the forest.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He returned to the forest where he belonged.
